tutorial.welcomeDescription: It looks like this is your first time here. Would you like a quick tutorial to learn the basics of the game?
tutorial.goalDescription: Your objective is simple: have the lowest score (the fewest cats) at the end of each round. The game ends when someone reaches 100 points - the player with the lowest total wins!
tutorial.goalTip: Cards range from 0 (best!) to 9 (worst). 9s are especially common, so watch out!
tutorial.handDescription: These 4 face-down cards are your Dream (Sen). You cannot freely look at them during the game, so memory is key! Each card has a value - you want low numbers.
tutorial.handTip: Try to remember which cards are where. A good memory gives you a huge advantage!
tutorial.firstPeekDescription: At the start of each round, you get to peek at exactly 2 of your 4 cards. Choose wisely and remember their positions! Click any two cards to reveal them.
tutorial.firstPeekTip: After peeking, click Finish Peeking to start the round.
tutorial.deckDescription: This is the Draw Pile. Draw a face-down card from here to see what fate brings you. You can then swap it with one of your cards, discard it, or use its special power!
tutorial.deckTip: Drawing from the deck gives you more options - you can discard if you do not like it.
tutorial.discardDescription: This is the Discard Pile. You can see the top card! If you take it, you MUST swap it with one of your cards - no peeking, no discarding.
tutorial.discardTip: Taking from discard is safe when you see a low number, but risky for high ones!
tutorial.drawingDescription: On your turn, choose one pile to draw from. From the Draw Pile: you can swap, discard, or use specials. From the Discard Pile: you must swap with a card in your Dream.
tutorial.drawingTip: Think strategically - sometimes a known card is better than a mystery!
tutorial.specialCardsDescription: Three magical cards have special powers when drawn from the deck: Take 2 (draw 2, keep 1), Peek 1 (look at any card), and Swap 2 (exchange any two cards blindly).
tutorial.specialCardsTip: Special cards have values 5-7, so be careful - using the power means discarding the card!
tutorial.pobudkaDescription: When you believe you have the lowest score, press POBUDKA! (Wake Up!) at the start of your turn instead of drawing. This ends the round immediately!
tutorial.pobudkaTip: Warning: If you are wrong and do not have the lowest score, you get +5 penalty points!
tutorial.scoringDescription: At round end, all cards are revealed. Everyone scores the sum of their 4 cards. If the POBUDKA caller does not have the strictly lowest score, they get +5 penalty points!
tutorial.scoringTip: The game ends when someone hits 100 points. Lowest total score wins!
tutorial.readyDescription: That is everything you need to know! Remember: low cards are good, memory is power, and call POBUDKA when you are confident. May your dreams be free of cats!
